txt.en:
'If you are neither a cook nor a prospector, steel your nerves, flex your muscles, and prepare to work.

'We need haulers, deliverers, and those willing to undertake some tasks that are less fitting of heroes and more the duties of everyday folk.

'Efforts by anyone assisting us in this manner will not go unnoticed. Speak with Velgerd Kilnwarden she can inform you of the work needs down here.'
